fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 55.10 points or 0.28% to settle at 19,384.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.70% to 10.94. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries, and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
